attributes.action: Make the TV companies remove the compulsory red interactive button which appear every time the TV is switched on or the channel is changed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The appearance of the red interactive button (dot) ever time you switch on the TV or change channel is, at best annoying and at worst an infringement of our civil liberties.It runs counter to our human rights and is an abomination. The TV company should allow us to choose whether we want it to appear! I do not!!!We should not have to make a conscious effort to remove it but choose to have it, if we want to not the other way round.
